channel.title: Furnace Bug
channel.description:
any one know how to fix this? http://gyazo.com/6cd0c4383382667f67b3b9199f430c95
i think it is the interface id but i do not have them. you can click on all of them and it will work but there is just no text to show the name of the bars.

item.title: Furnace Bug
item.dc:creator: @beale beale
item.description:
@beale wrote:

rsinterface.java most likely. considering that would be an interface. search for something along those lines. c.getPA().sendFrame126("Bronze", 3987); in rsInterface.java. if not in there, i would assume it would be in either client.java or Clickingbuttons.java or even smithing.java. Hope this helped.

Read full topic

item.title: Furnace Bug
item.dc:creator: @arabboi arabboi
item.description:
@arabboi wrote:

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:2, topic:550670”]3987 - Bronze
3991 - Iron
3995 - Silver
3999 - Steel
4003 - Gold
7441 - Mithril
7446 - Adamant
7450 - Rune

Edit:
Depending on the base (I assume it’s a PI), use c.getPA().sendFrame126("Bronze", 3987);[/quote]

Hey! thanks for replying. I just have one last question, do you perhaps know where I have to add that code?

Read full topic
